II. Purpose of Addendum
Wolverine Aftercare has moved their satellite office in Warren from 11885 E. 12
Mile Rd to 14049 E. 13 Mile Rd. The main office is in Taylor. Other satellite
offices are located in Bloomfield Hills and Flint.
III. Methodology
A virtual tour of this office was conducted on 2/9/18.
IV. Description of Findings and Conclusions
The office is a free-standing newly-constructed building. There is adequate staff,
visitor and handicapped parking available. There is a reception area, lobby, visitor
restrooms and emergency exit doors. Past the reception area, there is a secure
door leading to a long hallway.
The hallway extends to administrative staff offices, a large training/conference
room, open work stations, a dining area and restrooms for staff. A secure file
room with lockable cabinets will house the client files and confidential CHRI
information.
V. Recommendation
I recommend this agency continue its current licensing status with the move of this
satellite office to the new address/location.
